Report.Query: SELECT org_id, org_name, linkman, principal, emp_count, bus_count, route_count, site_count, driver_count, address, register_date, telephone, fax, post, region_area, area_code, parent_org_id, parent_org_name, org_grade FROM rpt_busiquery_corp
select a.orgid,a.orgname from mcorginfogs a where a.isactive=1 and a.orgid in (select b.parentorgid from mcorginfogs b)
